data.title: 50 Gallon Steel Transfer Tank
meta_keywords: aviation equipment TOPS - T50S-FR15 - 50 Gallon Steel Transfer Tank
data.meta_description: TOPS 50 gallon steel transfer tank with optional 15 GPM Fill-Rite transfer pump (UL Listed). Fill-Rite is the number one brand in fuel transfer pumps. They build their fuel transfer pumps right here in the USA.
data.text:
Build Your Tank Package: Select a Tank, Pump & Accessories

Options and Accessories

50 Gallon Vertical Steel Liquid Storage Tank (60 in. L x 12 in. W x 18 in. H).

Bolts & Washers for Installing the Tank to the Bed of a Truck

Tank Vent Cap

15 GPM Transfer Pump (UL Listed)

12 ft. Hose

Manual or Automatic Nozzle

Optional Digital Meter

Optional Filter Kit

Optional Swivel

This transfer tank meets D.O.T requirements for combustible diesel fuels only. Tanks are not designed for and do not meet D.O.T requirements for gasoline or other products that are rated as Flammable. This tank should not be used as an auxiliary fuel tank or be connected to a vehicles fuel system. Any misuse or incorrect installation will void the warranty.

TOPS steel vertical transfer tanks are Recommended for construction and agricultural use.

50 Gallon Tank

Vertical Tank

White or Black Finish

14 gauge steel

Lockable Vent Caps

Base mounting tabs

Baffles provide an even flow of liquid

Paints are electrostatically applied to maximize resistance to abrasion and corrosion

Aerodynamic domed lid adds strength

Ethafoam mounting strips protect truck's finish

Sturdy, one-piece, no sag base design

This transfer tank meets D.O.T requirements for combustible diesel fuels only. Tanks are not designed for and do not meet D.O.T requirements for gasoline or other products that are rated as Flammable. This tank should not be used as an auxiliary fuel tank or be connected to a vehicles fuel system. Any misuse or incorrect installation will void the warranty.

Dimensions
